Container.Changes: [center][font size=4]pihole Change Log[/font][/center] [b]Feb.2018:[/b]Changed Template to work with Debian base as Apline is depreciated.[br][br] [b]Changed to use the offical docker, this is just the template[/b]
Container.Name: pihole
Container.Description: Inspired by Pi-Hole - let's block those pesky ads![br][br] This Version 2 of the template is now self contained[br] [br]Please note that the directories have changed[br] so that you will need to add your previous WHitelist and Blacklists.[br] Cron jobs are run by using your TimeZone - see TZ variable[br] This is a fork of diginc/docker-pi-hole who did all the hard work[br][br] which I then tuned to the unRaid template system and removed the IPV6 reference.[br][br] Just set your DNS on your PC/Mac/Mobile to point to your unRaid servers IP[br] and pihole will forward valid requests to your defined DNS servers.[br] Point your Routers DNS server address to unRaid to cover your whole network!.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Setup IS required![/b] : Please see the environment variables.[br] Allows the use of Whitelists and Blacklists.[br] Web based admin on serverip/admin *** Make sure that you change unRaid's[br] default port as this uses port 80 or use Unraid 6.4 to set this to its own IP address[br][br]
